original_text: The people of Judah and Israel were as numerous as the sand on the seashore; they ate, they drank and they were happy.
korean_text: 유다와 이스라엘의 인구가 바닷가의 모래 같이 많게 되매 먹고 마시며 즐거워하였으며

sentences.original_text: The people of Judah and Israel were as numerous as the sand on the seashore
sentences.korean_translation: 유다와 이스라엘 백성들은 바닷가의 모래처럼 많았다
